title: George Washington
subtle:
Biography (nonfiction), 2,163 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1070L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     S and Y
description: George Washington's life was filled with twists and turns. From his early years as a farmer to leading a new nation through a terrible war and the establishment of a new government, his story will engage readers of all ages.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
